text:
@Alyssa_Milano Trump is 100% the wrong guy to even mention #Covid19 health research in public. Drs Fauci + Birx should report anything medical. 
Like @jacindaardern w/ @ashbloomfield. 
They'll get it right + safe + not just from a tweet.
Trump still isn't a leader - just an  exhibitionist.
